ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Yohkoh SXT browse images and movies
ResourceHeader.Description: There are several data products from the Yohkoh Soft X-ray Telescope (SXT) that are accessible through the Yohkoh Legacy Archive (YLA) at Montana State University. Display data include one movie-quality image per day, taken near mid-day, daily movies built from all Level 2 FITS images for the day, and weekly movies built from 12 images per day. YLA-accessible digital data are described in another VSPO data product descriptor.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Yohkoh data courtesy of the NASA-supported Yohkoh Legacy Archive at Montana State University.
